title: It’s literally Biden vs COVID in 2020
selftext:
The Trump administration is going full steam ahead, using ‘herd mentality’ to arrive at their preposterous goal of ‘herd immunity’ through mass infection. A goal that would cause millions of preventable deaths. 

Trump will surely use his relatively mild case (caught early through testing nobody has access to with treatments nobody else has access to) to argue the disease is no big deal and we should open up more. Get rid of these mask mandates. 

He may even promote his own supposed ‘immunity’ as a reason to get it!!  

So the 2020 election is now LITERALLY Biden vs COVID.
